Instinet.translation[0].definitions[0].d: an electronic network  that allows people to buy and sell shares using a computer when a stock exchange is closed.
Instinet.translation[1].definitions[0].d: an electronic network run by Reuters PLC, on which people using a computer that is able to connect to the network can buy and sell shares when a STOCK EXCHANGE is closed
Instinet.translation[1].definitions[0].e: The stock was trading actively on Instinet.
